product_name: The North Face Torpedo Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Torpedo jacket is a perfect training companion when you need a little boost of warmth or weather protection, without adding much weight. Polyester Apex ClimateBlock shell shields against wind and light rain; mesh under the arms maximizes breathability. Durable water repellent finish fends off light rain showers and snow. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Layered ventilation and back cape prevent air from stagnating inside. Zip hand pockets and zip back pocket stash your workout essentials. Media pocket with cord hole totes your tunes. Reflective logos on The North Face Torpedo jacket boost your visibility in dim light.
short_description: The North Face Torpedo jacket is a perfect training companion when you need a little boost of warmth or weather protection, without adding much weight.
